text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to state that the French company cannot legally act as the EU Exporter under EXW terms for customs purposes. The response addresses this directly in Section 1: \"If they insist on EXW, they are effectively saying: \u201cwe control export/import and you just make goods available.\u201d In practice, EXW from the EU is often non-workable because the non-EU buyer may not be able to act as exporter in France/EU, and it creates VAT/export evidence problems.\" This directly addresses the legal/practical impossibility of the French seller facilitating an EXW export where the buyer (US entity) is supposed to handle the export declaration from the EU.", "criterion_id": "cf77364d-885c-4118-9665-e75f304c088a"}
